main_text:
Philosophical Theology
4. Philosophical Theology

This section reviews Clarke’s key arguments in philosophy of
religion and philosophical theology. The topic of divine freedom was
covered in the earlier section on free will, as well as in 
the entry on 
  divine freedom. 
Clarke also wrote on topics such as divine attributes, baptism, the
historicity of disputed New Testament writings, and the veracity of
various Christian doctrines, which are not discussed here.
